Arnaav Sareen is a [founder](https://www.linkedin.com/in/arnaavsareen/) and
engineer working at the intersection of
artificial intelligence and compliance, he is building
[SIFT 's](https://www.siftaitechnologies.com/)
AI-native solutions for industry 4.0. With a background in Computer Science and Applied Economics from
[Cornell University](https://www.cornell.edu/), where he was the Captain of the D1 Men's [Varsity Squash](https://cornellbigred.com/sports/mens-squash/roster) team,
he is currently architecting compliance workflows and optimizing
microservices for manufacturing environments.
When not immersed in AI systems, his interests span art, history, Fantasy Premier League strategy, and the enduring hope that comes with supporting
[Tottenham Hotspur](https://www.tottenhamhotspur.com/). If you need more information
[contact him](mailto:aks247@cornell.edu).
